item.title: Technology and the Shifting Architecture of Occupational Skills
item.description: This paper develops a measurement framework to understand how technological transformation reshaped U.S. skill demands across 514 occupations, revealing three distinct adaptation mechanisms that determine worker outcomes.

item.title: From Posting to Prediction: Building Validated Workforce Analytics
item.description: This paper develops a methodology using internal job postings and large language models to measure and validate employee skill fit, demonstrating its predictive power in hiring decisions.

item.title: When TV Becomes a Stream: Content Decisions of a Video On Demand Service
item.description: This paper examines how the on-demand feature affects content strategy and quality investment in streaming platforms compared to traditional TV.

item.title: Revisiting Discrepancies in Sanitation Statistics of Rural India
item.description: This paper examines gaps in official sanitation statistics in rural India, particularly focusing on the omission of households in census towns.
